definitions.title: adv. acc.
definitions.body: as a consequence of, because (that) also reward, end (v. sub [[עָקַב]]; and cf, 9aqibun heel fig. consequence, result);—

Is 5:23 [[מַחְדִּיקֵי רָשָׁע]] [[עֵקֶב שׁׂחַד]] (adv. acc.) in consequence of a bribe. Ps 40:16 (= Ps 70:4) [[על עֵקֶב בָּשְׁתָּם]] (pleon.) according to the consequence of their shame, i.e. in consequence of the disgrace falling upon them. Hence as

definitions.title: conj.
definitions.body: [[עֵקֶב אֲשֶׁר]]  as a consequence of  (the fact) that, because, Ge 22:18 [[אֲשֶׁר שָׁמַעְתָּ]] ´[[בְּקׂלִי ע]] Ge 26:5, 2Sa 12:6 ; so [[עֵקֶב כִּי]] 2Sa 12:10, Am 4:12 [[כִּי זאת אעשׂה לך]] ´[[ע]]; [[עֵקֶב]] alone, Nu 14:24, and (sq. impf.) De 7:12 [[תשׁמעון]] ´[[ע]] in consequence of  your hearkening, etc., De 8:20.
consequence = gain, reward, Ps 19:12 [[בְּשָׁמְרָם עֵקֶב רָב]], Pr 22:4 ´[[עשֶׁר וגו]] ´[[יִרְאַת י]]([[וְ]])[[עֵקֶב עֲנׇוׇה ]].
end (of time), adv. acc., Ps 119:33 ´[[וְאֶצֳּרֶנׇּה ע]] to the end, v:Ps 119:112 [[לְעוֹלָם]] ´[[ע]] (cf. Sir 16:3; Targum [[עִקְבָּא]] (rare)).
